Header: Singing National Anthem in Tamil violates constitution- Pivithuru Hela Urumaya
Content: Pivithuru Hela Urumaya says that government’s plan to sing national anthem in Tamil at the National Independence Day Celebration on the 4th, violates the constitution. Expressing his views during a media briefing held in Colombo today, the party’s General Secretary MP Udaya Gammanpila had this to say.
